meanings.definition: Boast or brag about oneself excessively.
meanings.sent1: Tom always outvaunts about his grades to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She outvaunts about her new car to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The parrot outvaunts about how many words it can say.
meanings.sent4: The peacock outvaunts its colorful feathers to attract a mate.
meanings.sent5: The little boy outvaunts his toy collection to his siblings.

meanings.definition: To surpass in boasting or bragging.
meanings.sent1: Mary outvaunts all her classmates with her singing skills.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outvaunts his opponents with his record-breaking performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat outvaunts the dog by showing off its ability to climb trees.
meanings.sent4: The sun outvaunts all the stars in the sky with its brightness.
meanings.sent5: The chef outvaunts other cooks with his signature dish.

meanings.definition: To outdo in boasting or bragging.
meanings.sent1: The magician outvaunts his colleagues with his incredible tricks.
meanings.sent2: The CEO outvaunts his competitors with his business success.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outvaunts the birds by collecting more nuts.
meanings.sent4: The river outvaunts the stream with its powerful currents.
meanings.sent5: The artist outvaunts others with his unique painting style.
